bill.title: Domestic Workers Bill of Rights
bill.description: Establishes basic rights and protections for domestic workers. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-07-13 10:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 493) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-05-13.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 164) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB/EDB, JUD, referral sheet 30
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB/EDB on Friday, 03-15-13 11:00AM in House conference room 309.
The committee(s) on LAB/EDB recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 03-19-13.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 03-19-13 11:25AM in conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Hashem, Aquino, Ing, Takumi, Yamane, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Johanson.

The committees on EDB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Tsuji, Brower, Choy, Ohno, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Ward; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cachola.
Reported from LAB/EDB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1166) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and McKelvey, Takumi, Woodson excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 04-04-13 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Har, Belatti, Brower, Carroll, Kawakami, C. Lee, Wooley; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Ito, Tsuji; 2 Noes: Representative(s) McDermott, Thielen; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1616) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-09-13.

Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Ward voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Fale, Fukumoto, McDermott voting no (3) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 533).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 607).
Senate Conferees appointed: Hee, Chair; Shimabukuro, Co-Chair(s); Gabbard.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 692).
House conferees appointed: Nakashima, Tsuji, Rhoads Co-Chairs; Hashem, Johanson.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 704).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-24-13 10:30AM in conference room 325.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-25-13 10:30AM in conference room 325.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Tsuji, Rhoads, Hashem; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Johanson; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 76) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 4-30-13
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 76).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-13.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 24 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Fale, Fukumoto, Har, Ito, Jordan, McDermott voting no (6) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 755).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 761).
Enrolled to Governor.
